name: js-ast-experiments-of-mine
description: experiments and editable demos with JavaScript AST related technologies like recast, jscodeshift, ast-types, etc

scripts.copy: mkdir -p static && cp -r src/static/* static && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.slim.min.js node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js static
scripts.build: mkdir -p static && npm run copy &&  browserify src/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ react ] ] -o static/src.js
scripts.build-production: rm -rf static docs src/build && bankai build src/index.js && rm -rf static dist docs & mv src/dist static && npm run copy && mv static docs
scripts.build-production2: rm -rf static docs2 && npm run build && npm run minify && npm run copy && mv static docs2
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch" "npm run browser-sync"

author: Sebastian Gurin
